text: (UFir’awn) wathi: “Nikholwa kuye (uMûsâ) ndinganinikanga mvume. Inene yena yinkokeli yenu enifundise imilingo. Ngoko ke ndiya kuninqumla izandla zenu neenyawo zenu ngokwahlukana kwamacala (isandla sokhohlo nonyawo lokunene), yaye ndiya kunibethelela emithini yesundu. Yaye niya kwazi ngokwenene okokuba ngubani na apha kuthi (uFir’awn) neNkosi kaMûsâ (uAllâh) onokunika uncedo nesohlwayo sanaphakade.”
